module.name: class_of_connection_of_product
module.keywords: application, module, connection, class, product, process plant

purpose.P: The Class of connection of product application module supports the requirement to record classes of connection between classes of product.
The nature of a connection relationship between individual products may be specified by indicating a class of connection of which it is a member.

example.P: The relationship 'pump suction pipe connection' between:
that indicates there is a suction side connection between a pump and a pipe, is a class_of_connection_of_product.
At an instant in time, the cardinality for this relationship is follows:

UL.LI: a pump has zero (an immersed pump), one (usual) or many (through a manifold) connections to a pipes on the suction side;
a pipe has zero, one or many (though a manifold) connections to the suction side of pumps.

example.P: The connection between individual pump P_1001 and individual pipe FW_1001 can be classified as a 'pump suction pipe connection'.

note.P: The cardinality for the relationship is within the scope of the Cardinality of relationship application module.

LI.P: a mapping between one class of product and another that indicates the nature of a connection relationship between two individual products.

note.P: Connection of individual product is within the scope of the Connection of individual product application module.

LI.P: membership of a class of connection;

note.P: Membership of a class of connection of product is within the scope of the Product structure and classification application module.

LI.P: class of activity that make a connection;

note.P: Class of product that make a connection are within the scope of the Class of involvement of product in connection application module.

LI.P: class of composition relationship between connections to form a connection bundle;
class of connection relationship between activities;
class of connection relationship between documents;
class of connection relationship between organizations;
class of connection relationship between people.

uof.name: Class_of_connection_of_product
uof.description: The Class_of_connection_of_product UoF identifies a class of connection of product and defines the classes of product that are connected.
